            <string language="hu">Harc a törökök és a magyarok között</string>
            <string language="en">Fighting between the Hungarians and the Turkishes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kämpfen zwischen den Ungarn und dem Turkishes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combat entre les Hongrois et le Turkishes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luta entre os hungarians e o Turkishes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combattimento fra gli ungheresi ed il Turkishes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάλη μεταξύ των Ούγγρων και του Turkishes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El luchar entre los húngaros y el Turkishes</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Harc a törökök és a magyarok között (korabeli ábrázolás)</string>
            <string language="en">Fighting between the Hungarians and the Turkishes (contemporary representation)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Hódoltság,  végvári élet,  hadművészet,  portya,  </string>
            <string language="en">subjection, life in the border castle, warcraft, raid</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kämpfen zwischen den Ungarn und dem Turkishes 
(zeitgenössische Darstellung)</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Combat entre les Hongrois et le Turkishes 
(représentation contemporaine)</string>

          <description>

(respresentação contemporary)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Combattimento fra gli ungheresi ed il Turkishes 
(rappresentazione contemporanea)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάλη μεταξύ των Ούγγρων και του Turkishes (σύγχρονη
αντιπροσώπευση)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El luchar entre los húngaros y el Turkishes 
(representación contemporánea)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterwerfung, Leben im Randschloß, warcraft, 
Überfall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">soumission, la vie dans le château de cadre, warcraft, 
incursion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">subjection, vida no castelo da beira, warcraft, 
invasão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sottomissione, vita nel castello del bordo, warcraft, 
incursione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υποταγή, ζωή στο κάστρο συνόρων, warcraft, επιδρομή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sometimiento, vida en el castillo de la frontera, 
warcraft, incursión</string>
